bulkCodesDescription1: Using PlanetCash you can generate thousands of codes in a single operation.
bulkCodesDescription2: You can use this feature to create codes for custom certificates, gift cards, donations on behalf of users and redeemable codes that you can associate with your products.

importMethodText.title: Import File
importMethodText.subtitle: Use this method if one of the following criteria match your use case:
details: I want to provide the Recipient's name or Email for each code.
I want Plant-for-the-Planet to automatically email the recipients once it has been generated (optional).
I want to issue codes for different tree counts.

genericMethodText.title: Create Generic Codes
genericMethodText.subtitle: Use this method if the following criteria matches your use case:
details: All codes will have the same value.
I want to generate a number of code for arbitrary recipients.
Names and Emails cannot be associated with the code.

chargeConsentText: By clicking Issue Codes, you agree that above amount will be charged to your account.
invalidEmailWarningText: Please make sure that that recipient_email is a valid email. Using dummy or invalid emails will lead to account suspension in accordance with Platform terms and conditions.
unitsPerCodeRequired: Each code should contain at least 1 unit.
codeQuantityRequired: You need to create at least 1 code.
unitsPerCodeInvalidRange: One code can contain a maximum of 1000 units.
codeQuantityInvalidRange: A maximum of 5000 codes can be created.
featureAvailability: This feature is available only for partner projects.
planetCashDisabled: PlanetCash is not activated. Please activate PlanetCash to use this feature.
addBalanceGeneric: Please Click here to add funds.

instructionsUploadCSV.empty: Drag and drop / click to select a .xslx / .csv file for upload.
instructionsUploadCSV.error: Please check for issues and drag .xslx / .csv file here to upload.
instructionsUploadCSV.processing: Please wait while we analyze your file...
instructionsUploadCSV.success: Continue or drag .xlsx or .csv file here to replace current file.

errorUploadCSV.tooManyFiles: Please upload only a single file.
errorUploadCSV.fileTooSmall: The uploaded file seems to be empty.
errorUploadCSV.fileTooLarge: The uploaded file must be 5MB or less.
errorUploadCSV.missingColumns: The uploaded file does not contain the following columns:
errorUploadCSV.tooManyRecipients: A maximum of 1000 recipients can be processed in one transaction.
errorUploadCSV.unitsNotProvided: Units are missing/invalid for some recipients.
errorUploadCSV.notifyNotPossible: Email and name are missing for some recipients that are to be notified.
errorUploadCSV.instructionRowError: An error occurred on the 1st row. Please check if you have deleted the instructions, or if there is additional data.
errorUploadCSV.invalidEmails: recipient_email contains dummy/invalid emails on the following rows: {{rowList}}. Please remove invalid emails or add valid emails.
errorUploadCSV.generalError: Something went wrong. Please try after a while.

importInstructions: Please refer to the <2>documentation here</2>, download <5>Excel template here</5>, and <8>CSV template here.</8>
donationSuccess: Your donation was successful. Redirecting you to view donation details shortly...

donationError.planet_cash_insufficient_credit: Available credit = {{availableBalance}}. Please load balance in your PlanetCash account to make this donation.
donationError.default: Something went wrong. Please try after a while.
donationError.planet_cash_invalid_project: You cannot make a donation to the selected project.
